## Vector4.subtractFromFloatsToRef() method

Sets the given vector "result" set with the result of the subtraction of the given floats from the current Vector4 coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subtractFromFloatsToRef(x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number, result: Vector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | value to subtract |
|  y | <code>number</code> | value to subtract |
|  z | <code>number</code> | value to subtract |
|  w | <code>number</code> | value to subtract |
|  result | <code>Vector4</code> | the vector to store the result in |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the current Vector4.
